ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation

Class StaticSimulationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.ASimulationControl
      • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.StaticSimulationControl

  • public class StaticSimulationControl
extends ASimulationControl
    reads static simulation samples from a file and loops while active. may be only one value.
    Author:
    dhampl
